title: October 16, 2019: Zilliqa (ZIL): Down 6.14%; Price Crosses 20 Day Average
text:
How Did Zilliqa’s Price Fare Yesterday?

At the time of this writing, Zilliqa has a price of $0.005392 USD, which puts it down by approximately 6.14% from yesterday. The past 24 hours mark a reversal in price from the day prior; it should be noted, though, that price is still in a unclear trend, and is currently 2.23% below its 20 day moving average. Staying above this level may be critical to sustain short-term momentum. In terms of an expected trading range, the Bollinger bands on Zilliqa suggest price may bounce between $0.00491 and $0.00612 based on its momentum and volatility over the past 14 days. Price’s current proximity to the bottom of the range may make buying an attractive opportunity to traders interested in trading the range.

Trade Zilliqa (ZIL) and over 500 other cryptos across ten different exchanges — all from one app. Try Quadency.

The currency’s market cap currently stands at $48 million US dollars.

Daily Engagement Metrics Update

Over the past 24 hours, 24 transfers have been added to the blockchain recording transactions amongst holders of Zilliqa. Regarding a tally of holders, Yesterday saw Zilliqa’s wallet count fall by 0. If we observe percentage growth in holders and transfers, we find that Zilliqa ranks 32 out of the 34 Ethereum tokens we are tracking.

How are the Strong Holders of Zilliqa Faring?

The top 1,000 Zilliqa wallets hold over 98.28% of the token’s total money supply. If we focus on exchanges, which may be an correlated with liquidity and greater confidence in the currency, the exchange wallets that are in the top 1,000 wallets own 10.02% of the currency’s total money supply. Exchange ownership grew by 0.16% over the past week, while the overall ownership percentage of the top 1,000 richest wallets grew by 0.01% over that time period.

How Much Development is Occurring?

The last activity date on Zilliqa’s GitHub repository was October 15, 2019, or about 1 days ago. Over the past 30 days, we’ve seen open issues across Zilliqa’s GitHub repositories grow by 0.2 per day on average, while the number of watchers has grown by 0.87.

What’s Going on Social Media?

In terms of social media presence, Zilliqa saw its Twitter followers and Reddit subscribers go up by 12 and 1 over the past 24 hours. Twitter appears to be the most popular place to follow the company, and thus may be worth monitoring. Use this link to follow Zilliqa on Twitter.

Where to Buy

You can trade Zilliqa, listed under the symbol ZIL, through the following exchanges: Gate, Yobit, Binance, DDEX, Ethfinex.

Article by SixJupiter
